title: Advanced LaTeX: nested commands, for loops, environments

media:group.media:title: Advanced LaTeX: nested commands, for loops, environments
media:group.media:description:
Quick video going over \newcommand, \def, \newenvironment, and \foreach
Some (moderately) advanced LaTeX, nothing too crazy if you're new to LaTeX you should be able to understand these as well. Good to know to save some time as a student.

Tex Code on github:
https://github.com/SinaKhalili/latex-examples/blob/master/main.tex
LaTeX wikibook: 
https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/LaTeX
LaTeX and friends: 
https://www.springer.com/gp/book/9783642238154
